task.title: Graceful failover (old)
task.shortdesc: Failover is performed on a specific node via Server Nodes > Failover

step.cmd: For the server node, select Fail Over.
Select Graceful Failover to gracefully failover. Alternatively, select Hard Fail Over to force the failover or cancel.

step.info: While the node is being failed over, the failover process can be stopped by clicking on Stop Failover.
When failover occurs on a specific node, that node is marked as Failed Over: Pending Removal

step.cmd: To view the status of the failover operation, click Pending Rebalance.

info.note: If you perform the rebalance operation at this point before selecting a recovery option, the server node is removed from the cluster. Once removed, that same node can be added to the cluster but it is treated the same as a new server node. That means that all data on the server node is removed.
